column1: \c[1]And the mighty Paladin Diana as \n[8]'s new allies...
column2: \c[1]... y la poderosa paladina Diana son los nuevos aliados de \n[8]...

column1:
\c[1]
[8] sets out from Granheim Abbey, bound for the Donari Monastery at Lemelin.\! There, 
[5] hopes to gain the answers 
[5] seeks.\! 
[8] will have to reach Port Jenos, from which 
[5] can sail directly to Lemelin.
column2:
\c[1]
[8]Los tres abandonan la abadía de Granheim para dirigirse al monasterio donari de Lemelin.\! Allí, 
[5] espera conseguir las respuestas que 
[5] busca.\! 
[8] tendrá que llegar a Puerto Jenos, desde donde 
[5] podrá navegar directamente hasta Lemelin.

column1: \c[1]But now, \n[8] faces the Followers of Zanatus, who seem to have far-reaching power and influence.
column2: \c[1]Pero ahora, \n[8] se enfrenta a los Seguidores de Zanatus, que parecen tener gran poder e influencia.

column1: \c[1]It seems that \n[8]'s moment of rest will not last long, as the enemy has seen fit to call for reinforcements of its own...
column2: \c[1]Parece que \n[8] no podrá descansar, pues el enemigo ha considerado oportuno pedir refuerzos...
